SENT.plain: Colchicine is one of the oldest drugs known to us
During the last few years, it has been increasingly applied in the treatment of systemic dermatoses
Particularly in dermatoses mediated by neutrophils, colchicine has settled among other therapies
With regard to BehÃ§et's disease, it has even become the treatment of choice
The present review deals with further dermatological disorders sensitive to colchicine; in addition, we mention those dermatoses which do not show any therapeutic response to colchicine
The treatment with colchicine requires profound knowledge of the pharmacokinetics and mode of action regarding this substance, as well as the possible side effects
This knowledge allows safe and responsible treatment with colchicine
It has to be considered, however, that in the Federal Republic of Germany colchicine has not been registered for dermatological indications yet
